messages.subject: Re: UnschoolingDiscussion list reopened on yahoogroups
messages.msgSnippet: Absolutely lovely!  Thank You. I disliked using the google groups as all my other groups are here and I m lazy.  I ve been getting the google digests but just
messages.messageBody:
Absolutely lovely! Thank You.

I disliked using the google groups as all my other groups are here and
I'm lazy. I've been getting the google digests but just didn't find
them easyto read.

teresa b

--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...>
wrote:
>

>
> (or there might be a link at the bottom of each e-mail).
>

>

>

messages.subject: UnschoolingDiscussion list reopened on yahoogroups
messages.msgSnippet: Both the yahoo list and the google list will be accessible for discussions now. If you don t want to be on this list or you need to change your delivery
messages.messageBody:
Both the yahoo list and the google list will be accessible for
discussions now.

If you don't want to be on this list or you need to change your
delivery options, go to
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingDiscussion/

(or there might be a link at the bottom of each e-mail).


I deleted all the addresses that had been bouncing.

The archives are openly readable, so don't post anything secret or
sensitive.

Sandra
